e70ea35b-6d8e-4f2b-94d6-3bbb21aa3271.name: Sales Team Management

040b97e2-22dd-463d-8caa-d82881075591.name: Selling to Difficult Customers

08869b91-6367-4c82-8ff8-4f2f0c7dc58e.name: Stock Management

98ae7cf5-b13f-4de3-b142-fe4e61b479c2.description: This badge earners acquired skills that allow them to identify symptoms and factors of professional stress, develop skills for problem solving and identify emotional intelligence skills that allow them to manage stress. 98ae7cf5-b13f-4de3-b142-fe4e61b479c2.name: Stress Management

ca6c4eda-9d97-45dc-aa39-d6e051c25682.description: This badge earners understand the importance of the role of the leader in time management and the impact it has on the team's productivity.
